name: Roboom
storyline: In a universe not so far away from ours, beings known as Robocons once attempted to transcend the limits of their existence. This endeavor, however, transformed them into wicked creatures, eager to spread their oblivion throughout the multiverse. A faction of resilient Robocons did not fall into the Oblivion, joining the ranks of the Holistic Union to defend the multiverse in an impending war of minds. Your destiny as a Robocon of Vision awaits you!
summary: Ascened into the Robocon Universe! Roboom is an arena shooter roguelite where you blast through hordes of unique enemies and bosses. Are you ready to face the challenges of the Robocon War and rise to become the best in the Multiverse?
